name: A Story of Us - ep. 1 - First Memories
description: What's the true story ? The task to find it, it's yours !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: Works best in 720p or 1080p resolution
recommended_requirements: Processor: corei7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Card Nvidia GTX 660 2GB or Amd HD7870 2 GB Storage: 2 MB available space Additional Notes: Works best in 720p or 1080p resolution
